item.title: New Container: Grav
item.description: We have released a new container for Grav, a Fast, Simple, and Flexible, file-based Web-platform.
item.content: We have released a new container for Grav, a Fast, Simple, and Flexible, file-based Web-platform.

item.title: New Container: AdGuardHome Sync
item.description: We have released a new container for AdGuardHome Sync, a tool to synchronize AdGuardHome config to replica instances.
item.content: We have released a new container for AdGuardHome Sync, a tool to synchronize AdGuardHome config to replica instances.

item.title: ruTorrent is being deprecated
item.description: Our ruTorrent image is being deprecated. While it will still be available, no new version will be built. We are directing anyone still interested in using rTorrent / ruTorrent in docker to crazy-max’s container. If you are interested in taking over as a maintainer, please see this issue.
item.content: Our ruTorrent image is being deprecated. While it will still be available, no new version will be built. We are directing anyone still interested in using rTorrent / ruTorrent in docker to crazy-max’s container. If you are interested in taking over as a maintainer, please see this issue.

item.title: mariadb change to Alpine
item.description: We have created a new alpine based version of our mariadb container. Our intent is to move :alpine tag to :latest once ready. Further info on the timeline will follow in the coming weeks.
item.content: We have created a new alpine based version of our mariadb container. Our intent is to move :alpine tag to :latest once ready. Further info on the timeline will follow in the coming weeks.
